description:
Taikobo and the rest have split into teams to infiltrate Kingo Island. Taikobo teams up with his long-time friend Fugen Shinjin to search for Kingo Island`s core, where Bunchu waits. But on the way, they wander into the spatial paopei Kanpyojin, where they encounter Entenkun of the Juttenkun. Entenkun tries to begin combat using his control of ice through Kanpyojin, but Fugen Shinjin would rather seek a peaceful resolution...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ニューロマンティック
